25858.現在 木工職人レベル<%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>です。\n何を作りますか？:
Your current Woodworking level is <%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>.
What do you want to craft?<break>

30134.木工とは 素材となる木材を彫って\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\n<br>:
Woodworking is the process of carving a piece of wood to create a desired item. As the wood is carved, it is gradually shaved, so it is
shaped to follow the success line... The quality of the finished product depends on the accuracy of the... To execute a
woodworking command, you need to be able to concentrate. If you lose your concentration, you won't be able to do it, so pace yourself
and choose your commands... When you're carving, you're carving from the bottom of the grid to the top. If you're not following
the grain of the wood, you'll only be able to carve a little, so rotate your workbench to adjust the direction... Please note that if
the game is interrupted due to a communication error while you are working on a piece of wood, all the materials will be
lost.

31427.大カンナがけを使うと\nタテ２列を うすく削ることができます。\n細かい仕上げに:
With the large planer, you can cut two
vertical rows very thin... For fine
finishing...

31428.カンナがけを使うと\nタテ１列を うすく削ることができます。\n細かい仕上げに:
It's used to cut a single vertical row of
wood into a very thin... For fine
finishing...

31429.表面固めを使ったマスは しばらくの間\n何をしても 削られなくなります。:
The trout that have been resurfaced won't be
cut by anything for a while.

31430.昇竜彫りを使うと 上下２マスを\n下から突きあげるように彫ります。\n下側のマス:
By using A Carve Ahead, you can carve
vertically over two squares. The lower of the
squares will be pared especially hard!

31431.２倍彫りを使うと\nひとつのマスを ２倍のチカラで\n大きく削ることができます。:
With double carving, you can carve a single
square with twice the power...

31432.流星彫りを使うと 左下から右上に向かって\nナナメ２マスを 流れるように彫ります:
Using meteor engraving, you can carve two squares from the bottom left to the top right... The bottom squares are especially
hard to carve.

31433.３倍彫りを使うと\nひとつのマスを ３倍のチカラで\n大きく削ることができます。:
By using Triple Carve, you can pare a single
square with three times the power.

31434.大昇竜彫りを使うと タテ１列を\n下から突き上げるように彫ります。\n下のマスほ:
By using A Carve Above, you can carve a square
from below, pushing upwards. The lower
the square, the more strong it is!

31435.うでまくりをすると 次に彫る時に\nチカラが１.５倍になり 会心率も上がります。:
If you roll up the edges, you can use 1.5 times more power when you engrave the next time, and the critical rate will also be
higher. It is effective when used in combination with other skills!

31436.大河彫りは 左右２マスを\n左から連続で彫っていく 派手な技です。\n左側のマス:
Using Water's Edge, you can carve two
horizontal squares, starting from the left.
The left square is pared especially hard!

31437.超大河彫りは ヨコ１列を\n左から連続で彫っていく 高度な技です。\n左のマスほ:
River's Bank is an advanced technique that carves continuously starting from the left. The more to the left the square is, the
stronger it will be!

32869.ねらい彫りを使うと とぎすました\n会心率の高い ひと彫りをします！:
When you use Aiming Engraving, you'll get a
sharper, more accurate engraving!

37943.木工の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\n木材を彫って 成功ラインに沿うように\n:
This will explain Woodworking!
Try your best to carve the shape of the wood down to the dotted success line.
When each square is matching the success line, you're done! Select "Finish" to finish crafting.
When the direction of the wood's grain aligns with the direction you carve in, you will carve quite a lot of the wood.
Alternatively, if the directions do not match, you will carve only a little of the wood.
Rotate the workbench to change the wood grain's direction and carefully carve your way to success!

38844.会心0.1％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.1％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.1% permanently!

38845.会心0.2％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.2％分 上がるよう:

38847.会心0.3％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.3％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.3% permanently!

38848.会心0.5％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.5％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.5% permanently!

44220.一度 コツをつかんだレシピは\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できるようになります。\n:
Once you have a knack for a recipe, the "Quick Craft" command becomes available.
Quick Craft allows you to finish the item in no time flat! However, items created this way can never be ★★★ quality.
In addition, the chance of getting a critical hit while using "Craft Normally" has increased slightly!

45441.逆流星彫りを使うと 右下から左上に向かって\nナナメ２マスを 流れるように彫りま:
Using reverse meteor engraving, you can carve two squares from the bottom right to the top left... The bottom squares are especially
hard to carve.

53850.双竜彫りを使うと ２ｘ２マスを\n下から突き上げるように彫ります。\n下側のマス:
By using Twin Dragon Carve, you can carve
squares in a 2x2 area from the bottom up. The
bottom squares are pared especially hard!

103179.<color_yellow>\n「どうぐかばん」だけでなく 「預かり所」と\n「:
You can now use materials from your storage and house storage in addition to the items in your item bag for Woodworking!
When selecting a recipe with materials you don't have on hand, you have the option of using materials from either storage.

113261.くさび打ちを使ったマスは 次に彫る時に\n大きく削れるようになり 会心率も上がり:
The more squares you wedge, the more you'll be able to carve, and the better your accuracy will be. It works best when used in
combination with other spells.

but carves along the wood grain's direction

291548.ねらい大河彫りは\n木目に沿っているマスを\n高い会心率で彫る 大河彫りです。:

320511.やすりがけを使うと\n１マスを うすく削ることができます。\n細かい仕上げに 使:
